entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
